Empty_helmet: It can be used to craft many tools thanks to its hardness. {nl}Obtained from Pantos.

Empty_helmet: The stem can be processed into fabric. Not suitable for eating. {nl}Obtained from Zignuts.

Empty_Helmet: Sebuah bunga merah yang didapat hanya dari Firent. Cirinya adakah bunga yang besar. Didapat dari Firent.

Empty_helmet: A mutant variation of the Nucl, the power source of mutant monsters. Contains highly condensed magic that might explode if handled carelessly. {nl}Obtained from Egnomes.

Empty_Helmet: Kulit kayu yang panjang. Kegunaannya sangat banyak. Didapat dari Woopent.

Empty_helmet: Unlike other insect wings, it is smooth and flexible. {nl}Obtained from Mantiwoods.

Empty_Helmet: Tidak seperti serangga lain, dia sangat halus dan fleksibel. Didapat dari Mantiwood.

Empty_helmet: It is light and fragile due to its empty core. {nl}Obtained from Thornballs.

Empty_helmet: Due to its small size, only experienced crafters are able to use this properly. {nl}Obtained from Operors.

Empty_Helmet: Cukup lemah, tapi cukup untuk dijadikan Fiber. Didapat dari Bagworm.

Empty_Helmet: Crystal ini terbentuk dari pemadatan getah di dalam tanaman.{nl}Diperoleh dari Truffles.

Empty_helmet: People sometimes boil this stem to make a drink that curbs hunger. {nl}Obtained from Matsums.

Empty_helmet: Not used as a food, but often used for magic research. {nl}Obtained from Merogs.

Empty_helmet: If you're blinded by the crystals, you won't notice the monster lurking beneath. {nl}Obtained from Crystal Spiders.

Empty_helmet: You need to face great danger to obtain this. {nl}Obtained from Glizardons.

Empty_helmet: If you're not careful, the pocket may burst and the spores will fly out. {nl}Obtained from Maizes.

Empty_helmet: Venom collected from Scorpio.{nl}Is it really an ingredient for an energy drink?

Empty_Helmet: Sebuah racun yang dikumpulkan oleh Scorpio. Apakah bahan dari peningkatan energi, benar-benar?

Empty_helmet: Timber that looks usable as firewood. Burn it in a pile in the magic circle.

Empty_helmet: The wings of a small statue. The wings don't seem avian.

Empty_helmet: A bitter drink that imbues its consumer with strength.
없음_helmet: 힘이 솟는 비터 드링크. 맛이 쓰다.

Empty_helmet: Leather obtained from monsters. It can be used to create a variety of weapons.

Empty_helmet: A jar used to collect the poisons of various monsters. It looks very old.

Empty_helmet: A letter written by Horatius for borrowing the farming tool.

Empty_helmet: A magic stone made by Yonas. They say it can be used to destroy the magic circle.

Empty_helmet: A seed pouch stolen by monsters. There are nibble marks on it.

Empty_Helmet: Sebuah kantong benih dicuri oleh monster. Ada bekas gigitan di atasnya

Empty_helmet: An unidentifiable lump of meat. Smells fishy.

Empty_helmet: A small Goddess Statue restored by refusing its lost, scattered fragments piece by piece.

Empty_helmet: Well-seasoned timber that would make a strong fence.

Empty_helmet: A dagger which was placed on top of a piece of leather carved with a magic circle. Something about it feels ominous.

Empty_Helmet: Sebuah belati ditempatkan di atas selembar kulit diukir dengan lingkaran sihir. Ada perasaan buruk untuk itu

Empty_helmet: A Lizardman's sharp claw. The mysterious saplings react to it.

Empty_helmet: Body fluid extracted from an Orange Tama. It's used in the Druid's purification ceremony.

Empty_helmet: A small box found with seedlings. It's full of seeds.

Empty_helmet: The remains of a Tama from when it died. It is needed by a researcher.

Empty_helmet: The root of a grape vine requested by Researcher Monahan. It looks healthy, unlike its stem.

Empty_helmet: An antidote that can heal the poisoned farmers. Get it to them as soon as possible.

Empty_helmet: A horn that proves that the owner has killed the Tree Root Mole.

Empty_helmet: Reply letters from a man named Beikeol. Readable.

Empty_helmet: A statement for someone of the Legwyn family who ordered goods. It's for a medicine that has a dangerous side effect. It's readable.

Empty_Helmet: Studi yang dilakukan para peneliti Kerajaan Tomb hilang. Seseorang telah menginjak kulit dan mengaburkan karakter. Hal ini hampir tidak dapat dibaca

없음_helmet: 몬스터에게서 구한 끈적한 액체. 접착제로 쓰일 법 하다.
Empty_Helmet: Sebuah cairan lengket yang didapat dari monster. Dapat digunakan sebagai perekat.

Empty_helmet: A bundle of dry brush gathered up. Looks like it would burn well.
없음_helmet: 덤불을 긁어 모인 것. 잘 탈 것 같다.
Empty_Helmet: Seikat semak kering yang dikumpulkan. Sepertinya dapat dengan mudah dibakar.

Empty_helmet: A journal recorded by Itebaras. It records the inscriptions on the tombstones at the Namu Temple Ruins.
없음_helmet: 아이트바라스의 기록을 적은 일지. 나뮤 사원터의 비석에 새겨져 있던 비문들을 모은 것.
Empty_Helmet: Sebuah jurnal yang ditulis oleh Eitbaras. Isinya merupakan ukiran pada batu-batu nisan di Namu Temple Ruins.

Empty_helmet: A bone fragment from a Halloventor Archer. It can be used as an anti-rusting agent.
없음_helmet: 할로우벤터 궁수의 뼈 조각. 녹 방지제의 재료로 쓰인다고 한다.
Empty_Helmet: Potongan tulang dari Hollow Hunter Archer. Dipakai sebagai bahan dari anti karat.

Empty_helmet: The metal plate that Justas is looking for.
Empty_Helmet: Metal plate yang sedang dicari oleh Eustace

Empty_helmet: The metal plate that Justas is looking for. Heavily rusted from sitting in the well for so long.
없음_helmet: 유스타스가 찾고 있던 금속판. 우물에 빠져 있었기 때문에 녹이 심하게 슬었다.
Empty_Helmet: Kepingan logam yang dicari oleh Eustace telah dipenuhi karat karena terendam didasar sumur begitu lama.

Empty_helmet: A cord and magnet that Justas gave to you. If you attach the rope to the well's pulley system, you can get the metal plate at the bottom.
없음_helmet: 유스타스가 준 밧줄과 자석. 이걸 우물의 도르레에 걸면 우물바닥의 금속판을 꺼낼 수 있을 듯 하다.
Empty_Helmet: Magnet terikat tali yang diberikan oleh Eustace untukmu. Bila kau pasang talinya pada katrol sumur, kau dapat meraih logam yang berada di dasarnya.

Empty_helmet: An extract obtained from defeated monsters.
Empty_Helmet: Ekstrak tapi bukan kulit manggis, melainkan dari monster yang dikalahkan

Empty_helmet: Rust powder scraped off a rusty metal plate. Some monsters will react to it.
없음_helmet: 녹슨 금속판으로부터 적당히 긁어 낸 녹 가루. 어떤 몬스터는 반응을 보인다고 한다.
Empty_Helmet: Serbuk karat yang kau gerus dari logam penuh karat. Monster mungkin akan berpengaruh dengan itu

Empty_helmet: A bubbling liquid. Mix it with an acidic solution to create a rust remover.
없음_helmet: 부글거리는 액체. 이걸 산성 용액과 섞어서 녹 제거제를 만든다고 한다.
Empty_Helmet: Cairan berbuih, campur dengan larutan asam untuk merontokan karat

Empty_helmet: A metal plate sought after by Alwida.
Corrosives given to you by Alwida. It can corrode metal plates.
없음_helmet: 알뤼다가 건네 준 부식제 이것으로 금속판을 부식시킨다고 한다.
Empty_Helmet: Asam korosif yang diberikan Alwida, dapat melubangi pelat logam

Empty_helmet: A metal plate that was laid below vines. It's in good condition.
없음_helmet: 덩굴 아래 깔려 있던 금속판. 상태가 좋다.
Empty_Helmet: Pelat logam yang berada dibawah tumbuhan jalar. Kondisinya baik

Empty_helmet: A stick obtained from monsters. It's uniquely metallic.
없음_helmet: 몬스터로부터 얻은 막대. 독특하게도 금속성을 가지고 있다고 한다.
Empty_Helmet: Tongkat dengan logam unik, diperoleh dari monster

Empty_helmet: A stone with an unusual aura. By rubbing it against a stick one can make a Detection Rod.
없음_helmet: 묘한 기운을 띈 돌. 막대기에 문질러 탐지봉을 만들 수 있다.
Empty_Helmet: Batu yang memancarkan aura tak biasa bila didekat logam. Cukup pasang pada tongkat untuk membuat tongkat pendeteksi.

Empty_helmet: A Detection Rod that can find metal plates. Crudely made, and looks like it won't last long.
없음_helmet: 금속판을 찾아 낼 수 있는 탐지 막대. 대충 만든 것이라 그리 오래 쓸 수 있을 것 같지는 않다.
Empty_Helmet: Tongkat pendeteksi logam, dibuat secara asal dan tampaknya tak akan tahan lama.

Empty_helmet: A metal plate found with a Detection Rod.
Empty_Helmet: Pelat logam yang ditemukan dengan tongkat pendeteksi

없음_helmet: 알뤼다가 그 동안 모아 놓은 연구 성과.

Empty_helmet: Coagulant given to you by the Blacksmith.
Empty_Helmet: Zat pengental yang kau peroleh dari Blacksmith

Empty_helmet: Copy of the Nuoridin Falls Prophecy
Empty_Helmet: Copy of the Nuoridin Falls Prophecy

Empty_helmet: A copy of the Nuoridin Falls Prophecy given to you by Adrius.
없음_helmet: 아드리유스가 준 누오로딘 폭포의 예언의 사본.
Empty_Helmet: Salinan dari Ramalan Nuorodin Falls yang kau peroleh dari Adrius

Empty_helmet: Tools for taking rubbings from tombstones.
Empty_Helmet: Alat untuk mengambil huruf cetak timbul dari batu nisan

Empty_helmet: A fixative for making ink stick to tombstones.
없음_helmet: 먹물이 비석에 잘 묻도록 도와 주는 정착액.
Empty_Helmet: Perekat yang membuat tinta merekat pada batu nisan

Empty_helmet: White fur bundle cut from a Rambear. It appears gray, as if dirt ridden.
없음_helmet: 램베어의 몸에서 잘라낸 흰 털뭉치. 때가 묻어서인지 회색처럼도 보인다.
Empty_Helmet: Bulu putih yang diambil dari Rambear. Warnanya sedikit keabuan, tampaknya kotor

Empty_helmet: A censer in which Vaidotas has put in a special combination of incenses. The scent weakens the Vubbes.
없음_helmet: 바이도타스가 조합한 특제 향을 담은 향로. 부베들에게 무력감을 느끼게 한다고 한다.
Empty_Helmet: Dupa yang diramu khusus oleh Vaidotas. Aromanya melemahkan Vubbes

Empty_helmet: Chemical agents that cause Vubbes to hallucinate, preventing them from approaching the entrance.
없음_helmet: 부베들에게 환각을 일으켜 입구 근처에 얼씬도 못하게 하는 화학 작용제
Empty_Helmet: Cairan kimia yang membuat Vubbe berhalusinasi, dan membuat mereka menjauh dari pintu masuk

Empty_helmet: A lump from a Moa, a predator of the Pantos. It smells awful.
없음_helmet: 판토들의 천적, 모아의 혹이 든 주머니. 냄새가 역하다.
Empty_Helmet: Gumpalan dari Moa, Predator dari Pantos. Baunya tengik.

Empty_helmet: A Fisherman's eye. It feels like it's staring at you.
없음_helmet: 피셔맨의 눈. 뚫어져라 쳐다보고 있는 것 같다.

Empty_helmet: A dying essence found in an Ellom's body. It's sticky.
없음_helmet: 엘름의 몸 안에 고인 정수. 끈적끈적하다.
Empty_Helmet: Seonggok esensi yang ditemukan pada tubuh Ellom. Lengket!

Empty_helmet: Made by properly stringing together Ellom Essences and Fisherman Eyes
없음_helmet: 엘룸의 정수와 피셔맨의 눈을 적당히 꿰어서 만든 것.
Empty_Helmet: Dirakit dengan cara menyatukan Ellom Essence dan Fisherman Eye

Empty_helmet: An eye that can see hidden souls. It was made by the Bokor Master requested by Knight Commander Uska, who was investigating disappearances regarding the Klaipeda Market.
없음_helmet: 숨겨진 영혼들을 볼 수 있는 영혼의 눈. 기사단장 우스카가 클라페다 시장 실종 사건을 조사하기 위해서 보코르 마마에게 직접 부탁해서 만든 물건이다.
Empty_Helmet: Mata yang dapat melihat jiwa yang bersembunyi. Dibuat oleh Bokor Master atas permintaan Knight-Commander Oscar, yang tengah menyelidiki orang hilang di pasar Klaipeda.

Empty_helmet: A necessary ingredient to make the straw doll.
Empty_Helmet: Bahan penting untuk membuat boneka jerami

Empty_helmet: An orb prepared by the Bokor Master in order to soothe the souls of the injustly slain people of the Andale Village.
없음_helmet: 억울하게 죽은 안데일 마을 주민들을 위로하기 위해 보코르 마스터가 준비했다.
Empty_Helmet: Orb yang disiapkan Bokor Master untuk menenangkan jiwa yang terbunuh secara tak layak pada kota Andale

Empty_helmet: An Orb of Comfort that has been fully filled. It can soothe the souls of the injustly slain people of the Andale Village.
없음_helmet: 완전하게 채워진 위로의 구슬. 억울하게 죽은 안데일 마을 주민 영혼을 위로할 수 있다.
Empty_Helmet: Orb penenang yang telah terisi penuh. Dapat menenangkan jiwa yang terbunuh secara tak layak pad akota Andale

Empty_helmet: A crystal that Goddess Saule filled with her power to purify the Thorn Forest.
없음_helmet: 가시숲을 정화하기 위해서 사울레 여신의 권능을 담은 수정
Empty_Helmet: Kristal yang diimbuhi kekuatan Goddess Saule untuk memurnikan Thorny Forest

Empty_helmet: A magical tool of the Cryomancer Master. It can freeze even the soul of a monster.
없음_helmet: 크리오맨서 마스터의 마도구. 몬스터의 영혼까지 얼려버린다.
Empty_Helmet: Peralatan magis milik Cryomancer Master. Dapat membekukan jiwa monster

Empty_helmet: A fragment of a monster's soul, solidified into a frosty crystal.
없음_helmet: 냉기 수정으로 얼어붙은 몬스터에게서 나온 영혼 파편
Empty_Helmet: Kepingan jiwa monster yang membeku dan mengkristal

Empty_helmet: An ingredient needed for the Cryomancer Master's test.
Empty_Helmet: Bahan yang diperlukan untuk test dari Cryomancer Master

Empty_helmet: An orb made by Zubeck to easily locate his secret stash.
없음_helmet: 즈벡이 숨긴 물건들을 쉽게 찾을 수 있도록 만든 구슬
Empty_Helmet: Orb yang dibuat oleh Zubeck untuk memudahkan ia menemukan penyimpanan tersembunyinya

Empty_helmet: A scripture needed for repairing the sealed tower in the Uskis Arable Land.
없음_helmet: 우키스 경작지의 봉인탑을 복구하는데 필요한 문장
Empty_Helmet: Naskah yang diperlukan untuk memerbaiki menara tersegel di Uskis Arable Land

Empty_helmet: A potion that the Royal Army had. Used when making Resounding Bomb.
없음_helmet: 왕국군이 가지고 있는 물약. 폭음탄을 만들때 사용된다.
Empty_Helmet: Ramuan yang dimiliki Military Kingdom, digunakan kala meramu Explosive Shot

Empty_helmet: A bomb that doesn't have much explosive power, but creates a huge noise when set off.
없음_helmet: 폭발력은 없지만 엄청난 소리나게 큰 소리를 내는 폭탄
Empty_Helmet: Bom yang tak berdaya ledak tinggi, namun menciptakan suara sangat bising kala meledak

Empty_helmet: A bomb discovered in the Outpost area. Seems like it's become a dud.
없음_helmet: 전초구역에서 발견된 폭발. 오래되서 불발된 것 같다.
Empty_Helmet: Bom yang ditemukan di area Outpost. Tampaknya sudah non-aktif

Empty_helmet: A box with tools to safely remove bombs
없음_helmet: 폭탄을 제거 하는 도구들이 담겨있는 상자
Empty_Helmet: Perkakas untuk mengangkut bom secara aman

Empty_helmet: A sample of the poisonous wedge needle used to attack the monks. The Hunter Tracker Captain might be able to identify it.
없음_helmet: 마비독에 걸린 수도사들의 몸에서 뽑아낸 쐐기침의 견본. 헌터 추적대장이라면 정체를 알지도 모른다.
Empty_Helmet: Barang bukti atas jarum beracun yang digunakan untuk menyerang Monk. Tampaknya Hunter Tracking Master dapat mengenalinya.

Empty_helmet: An antidote that the Hunters always have with them. It cures simple poisons immediately.
없음_helmet: 헌터들이 상시 가지고 있는 해독제. 간단한 독은 금새 해독할 수 있다.
Empty_Helmet: Penawar racun yang selalu dibawa Hunter. Dapat menyembuhkan racun sederhana dalam sekejap.

Empty_helmet: Evoniphon's trap. It's in perfect working condition.
없음_helmet: 에보니폰의 함정. 아직 작동하지 않은 온전한 상태이다.

Empty_helmet: Monk Wiley's treasured sheet of scripture. Looks like they were scattered during the uproar.
없음_helmet: 수도사 와일리의 소중한 경전 낱장. 난리통에 흩어진 것 같다.
Empty_Helmet: Scripture berharga milik Monk Wiley. Tampaknya tercecer dikala terjadi kerusuhan

Empty_helmet: Mushrooms commonly found in the Thorn Forest. It seems they must be cooked to be edible.
없음_helmet: 가시숲에서 자주 볼 수 있는 버섯. 조리를 해야 먹을 수 있을 것 같다.
Empty_Helmet: Jamur yang dapat ditemukan pada Thorn Forest. Harus dimasak agar bisa dimakan

Empty_helmet: A piece of a Rocktor's leg. Can be used in weapons due to its shape and hardness.
없음_helmet: 락터의 다리조각. 매우 단단하여 무기 재료로도 사용되는 모양이다.
Empty_Helmet: Kepingan kaki Rocktor. Dapat digunakan sebagai senjata karena bentuk dan kekerasannya

Empty_helmet: A thorn found on the Chafperor's forearm. Venom oozes from it.
없음_helmet: 체이퍼러 메이지의 팔뚝에 있는 가시. 독액이 흘러 나온다.
Empty_Helmet: Tanduk beracun yang diambil dari lengan Chafperor

Empty_helmet: A thorny tree that grows on wicked energies. Its thorns are poisonous.
없음_helmet: 사악한 기운으로 자라나는 가시나무. 독이 서린 가시가 박혀 있다.
Empty_Helmet: Pohon berduri yang tumbuh dari energi jahat. Durinya beracun

Empty_helmet: Water from the spring. It's been contaminated with poison.
없음_helmet: 샘에서 뜬 물. 독이 섞여 있다.
Empty_Helmet: Diperoleh dari mata air yang terkontaminasi racun

Empty_helmet: A bowl used to extract the poison out of the contaminated spring water. There's a hollow spot in which the poison collects.
없음_helmet: 샘물에 섞인 독을 모으기 위한 그릇. 우묵한 곳에 독이 고인다.
Empty_Helmet: Mangkuk sebagai penyaring racun pada mata air, ada lubang dimana racunnya akan tertahan.

Empty_helmet: A leaf attached to the head of a Woodluwa. It can be used as an ingredient for an antidote.
없음_helmet: 우드르와의 머리에 달려 있는 잎사귀. 해독제의 재료가 된다고 한다.
Empty_Helmet: Daun yang tumbuh di kepala Woodluwa, dapat digunakan sebagai penawar

Empty_helmet: A medicinal herb that Chevas from the Bastille Company was looking for. He says it will aid against poisonous attacks.
없음_helmet: 바스틸의 컴패니언인 체바스가 찾아낸 약초. 마비독의 해독을 돕는다고 한다.
Empty_Helmet: Tumbuhan  obat yang dicari oleh Chebas dari Bastille Company. Dia bilang itu akan membantu memulihkan serangan beracun

Empty_helmet: It's an empty beehive without any honey in it. Where is the honey?
없음_helmet: 꿀은 없고 빈 벌집만 말라 붙어 있다. 꿀은 어디에?
Empty_Helmet: Sarang lebah tanpa madu didalamnya… tanpa madu? Dimana madunya?

Empty_helmet: A sweet-smelling secretion from a Woodluwa. It can soften hardened honeycombs.
없음_helmet: 왠지 달콤한 냄새를 풍기는 우드르와의 분비액. 굳은 벌집을 부드럽게 만들 수 있다.
Empty_Helmet: Zat yang dikeluarkan oleh Woodroit, beraroma manis. Dapat melunakkan sarang lebah

Empty_helmet: A large cap from the head of a liverwort plant. It exudes a strange smell.
없음_helmet: 우산이끼의 머리에 달려있는 커다란 갓. 이상한 냄새가 난다.
Empty_Helmet: Lingkaran besar dari kepala liverwort plant. Mengeluarkan aroma aneh

Empty_helmet: A fragment that broke off a Stonecon. It twitches ever so slightly.
없음_helmet: 스토내콘이 부서지고 남은 파편. 조금씩 꿈틀대는 것 같다.
Empty_Helmet: Kepingan yang pecah dari Stonecon, sepertinya bergerak sedikit

Empty_helmet: An old book from the grave of a dead man. Hunter Natasha may be able to find something of use from this book.
없음_helmet: 죽은 남자의 무덤에서 나온 낡은 책. 헌터 나타샤라면 이 책에서 무언가를 발견할 수 있을지도 모른다.
Empty_Helmet: Buku tua dari kuburan seseorang. Hunter Natasha mungkin dapat menemukan sesuatu dari buku ini

Empty_helmet: A letter found in an old book left behind by a dead man. It contains an order for an assassination as well a confirmation of its execution.
없음_helmet: 죽은 남자가 남긴 낡은 책에 껴 있던 편지. 암살 의뢰서와 수령 확인서가 들어 있다.
Empty_Helmet: Surat yang ditemukan dari buku tua dari kuburan seseorang. Tertulis perintah untuk pembunuhan, serta konfirmasi telah terlaksananya hal itu.

Empty_helmet: An aquatic plant that grows in watery environments. It can filter and purify water.
없음_helmet: 물이 들어찬 곳에서 자라는 수초. 물을 정수할 수 있다.
Empty_Helmet: Tumbuhan aquatic yang tumbuh di lingkungan berair, dapat menyaring dan menjernihkan air.

Empty_helmet: A crystal ball found in a wooden box at the monastery. Used to activate the device in the prayer hall.
없음_helmet: 수도원의 나무 상자 속에 들어 있던 수정구. 기도실의 장치를 작동하는 데에 쓰인다고 한다.
Empty_Helmet: Bola kristal yang ditemukan dalam kotak kayu di monastery. Gunakan untuk mengaktivasi device pada prayer hall

Empty_helmet: A strong potion used for removing odors. It has an antiseptic scent to it.
없음_helmet: 냄새를 없애는 데 쓰는 독한 물약. 소독약 냄새가 난다.
Empty_Helmet: Ramuan yang mampu menghilangkan bau yang kuat sekalipun, mengandung antiseptik.

Empty_helmet: Scriptures that were scattered by rampaging monsters. Bring them to Mohaim.
없음_helmet: 몬스터가 난리치는 통에 여기저기 흩어진 경전들. 모하임에게 가져다 주자.
Empty_Helmet: Scripture yang tercerai berai karena serangan monster. Bawa itu ke Mohaim

Empty_helmet: It's as if the powerful blade shows its user the way of the sword.
없음_helmet: 굳건한 날이 사용자에게 검의 길을 보여주는 듯합니다.
Empty_Helmet: Tampaknya kekuatan pedang ini mengajari pemiliknya cara mengendalikan pedang.

Empty_helmet: The true power of this blade is its ability to cleave everything between you and your enemy.
없음_helmet: 당신과 적 사이를 갈라놓는 것이 이 검의 진정한 효용입니다.
Empty_Helmet: Kekuatan sejati pedang ini adalah kemampuannya membelah apapun yang ditebasnya.

Empty_helmet: You can feel the experienced tough from the handle, and a cold cruelty from blade. Great users only experience the first case.
없음_helmet: 자루에서 익숙한 거칠음을, 날에서 차가운 잔인함을 느낄 수 있습니다. 훌륭한 사용자는 보통 전자만을 체험합니다.
Empty_Helmet: Kau dapat merasakan dingin dan kejamnya, bahkan pengalaman pemilik sebelumnya yang agung.

Empty_helmet: The souls of the swordsmen fighting to death with sword in hand is reflected in this blade.
없음_helmet: 죽어서도 검을 떨구지 않고자 하는 검사들의 투혼이 반영된 검입니다.
Empty_Helmet: Jiwa ahli pedang yang bertarung hingga mati terasa pekat pada pedang ini.

Empty_helmet: A diligent Owl Sculpture's wing fragment.{nl}It is blessed with holy power.

Empty_Helmet: Fragment dari wing of Scared Owl Sculpture's friend. Yang telah menjadi batang kayu biasa.

Empty_helmet: An unpolished gem ore. The gem within the stone is also dull as it hasn't been polished yet.

Empty_Helmet: Serum yang didapatkan dari darah Monster. Bahan tersebut juga diminta oleh officer.

Empty_helmet: A unequal crystal fragment. A material requested by Vaidotas.
없음_helmet: 균일하지 못한 수정 조각. 바이도타스가 부탁한 재료입니다.
Empty_Helmet: Unequal crystal fragment. Sebuah bahan yang diminta oleh Vaidotas.

Empty_helmet: Serum collected from the blood of dead Vubbes.
Empty_Helmet: Serum yang dikumpulkan dari darah Vubbes yang sudah mati.

Empty_Helmet: Kunci untuk melepaskan seal dari Royal Tomb.

Empty_helmet: A map showing the location of something.{nl}Treasure, maybe?
Empty_Helmet: Pete yang menunjukkan lokasi sesuatu.{nl}Treasure, mungkin

없음_helmet: 바키스가 평생을 바쳐 기록한 일지. 무척 소중히 여기는 것 같습니다. 읽어볼 수 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Jurnal yang menceritakan seluruh kehidupan dari Varkis. Sepetinya sangat berharga baginya. Dapat di baca

Empty_helmet: A tool kit including a chisel, hammer, rope and more.

Empty_Helmet: Peralatan yang terdiri dari pahat, martil, tali, dan lainnya.

Empty_helmet: A memorial for the people who died in this area is engraved here.
없음_helmet: 이 일대에서 죽어간 사람들을 위한 추모의 내용이 적혀 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: This device searches for evil spirits by absorbing energy from soldiers.
Empty_Helmet: Peralatan ini mencari evil spirit dengan cara menyerap energi dari para pasukan.

Empty_helmet: A small piece of rock that broke off from a stone pillar. Its purpose is not certain, but looks expensive.

Empty_helmet: Refined powder collected from a stone pillar's surface. Its use is unclear.
없음_helmet: 돌기둥 표면에서 채취한 고운 가루. 어디에 쓰이는 지는 알 수 없습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Refined powder dikumpulkan dari reruntuhan stone pillar. Kegunaannya masih belum jelas.

Empty_Helmet: Bongkahan batu kecil yang ditemukan di perut monster. Sepertinya merupakan bagian dari Victim Relic.

Empty_helmet: A scroll that opens a distortion in space. With this, it is possible to obtain the key that belonged to the Great King Zachariel.

없음_helmet: 자카리엘 왕의 봉인을 푸는 데 필요한 열쇠입니다.

Empty_Helmet: Salah satu persyaratan dari Hoplite Master. Terlihat sangat kuat.

Empty_helmet: One of the task requirements by the Hoplite Master. It would be fatal to be stabbed by it.

Empty_helmet: Not sure what's inside but it smells foul.

Empty_Helmet: Ledakan untuk memblok Vubbe Raider lewat jalur rahasia

Empty_Helmet: Fragment dari Woodman kadang bergerak - gerak menyeramkan.

Empty_helmet: A report by Joint Investigation Unit Member Scott regarding suspicious activity in the area. Readable.
없음_helmet: 합동조사단원 스캇이 보낸 수상한 움직임에 관한 보고서. 읽어볼 수 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Report oleh Anggota Join Investigation Unit Scott mengenai aktifitas yang mencurigakan. Dapat dibaca.

Empty_helmet: A scroll that allows you to collect spirits. Only usable on certain monsters.

Empty_helmet: An orb that has a Red Vubbe Shooter's spirit sealed within.

Empty_helmet: The Owl Sculpture's upper piece.{nl}Restoration is, unfortunately, infeasible.
없음_helmet: 부엉이 조각상의 윗 부분. 안타깝게도 복구는 힘들 것 같습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Bagian atas Owl Sculpture.{nl}Perbaikan, sayangnya, tidak layak.

Empty_helmet: The Owl Sculpture's lower piece.{nl}The shape is barely recognizable.
없음_helmet: 부엉이 조각상의 아랫 부분. 형체를 간신히 알아볼 수 있을 정도입니다.
Empty_Helmet: Bagian bawah Owl Sculpture.{nl}Bagian ini dapat dikenali.

Empty_helmet: A pedestal piece of the Owl Sculpture.{nl}It's about to break in half.
없음_helmet: 부엉이 조각상의 받침대 부분. 반토막나기 직전입니다.

Empty_helmet: A special oil to burn the Owl Sculpture which has unfortunately been shattered.
없음_helmet: 안타깝게 부숴진 부엉이 조각상을 태우기 위한 특별한 기름입니다.
Empty_Helmet: Special oil untuk membakar Owl Sculpture yang sayangnya telah hancur.

Empty_helmet: A wheat box containing a small number of grains. The box has been ripped apart.

Empty_Helmet: Wheat box yang berisikan sebagian kecil padi - padian. Box telah hancur.

Empty_helmet: A pocket which contains the strange medicine. When the Vubbes consume it, they become brave, but if humans consume it, they will have stomachache.
없음_helmet: 이상한 약이 가득 담긴 주머니. 부베가 먹으면 매우 용감해지지만 사람이 먹으면 복통을 유발한다고 합니다.
Empty_Helmet: Pocket yang berisikan strange medicine. Ketika dikonsumsi Vubbes, mereka menjadi berani, tapi kalau manusia yang mengkonsumsi, mereka akan sakit perut.

Empty_helmet: A telescope lens used at the Astral Tower.
없음_helmet: 별의 탑에서 사용 되었다는 망원경 렌즈입니다.

Empty_helmet: A stone carried by the Hogmas. It attracts monsters.
없음_helmet: 호그마들이 지니고 있는 돌. 몬스터를 불러온다고 합니다.
Empty_Helmet: Stone yang dibawa oleh Hogmas. Memancing monster.

Empty_helmet: Friedka believes that this amulet is the key to the ruin's secrets.
없음_helmet: 프리드카는 이 호신부가 유적의 비밀을 풀기 위한 열쇠라고 믿고 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Pridca percaya bahwa amulet ini adalah kunci ke ruin secret.

Empty_helmet: Supplies of the unit which Lynt is a part of. A Wendigo ran away with it.
없음_helmet: 린트가 소속된 부대의 보급품. 웬디고가 훔쳐 달아나버렸습니다.

Empty_helmet: A herb with a decent painkiller effect.
없음_helmet: 진통제 대신으로 쓸 만한 약초라고 합니다.

Empty_helmet: This stone is said to attract Sauga. Could this be true?
없음_helmet: 이걸로 사우가스를 유인할 수 있다는데 사실일까요?
Empty_Helmet: Stone yang dikatakan menarik bagi Sauga. Apakah ini benar?

Empty_helmet: A fragment of a relic swallowed by Denoptic. A monster that feeds on stone, how curious.
없음_helmet: 덴옵틱이 삼킨 유물의 파편. 돌을 먹는 몬스터라니 이상합니다.
Empty_Helmet: Fragment dari relic yang ditelan oleh Denoptic. Monster yang memakan itu membuat penasaran.

Empty_helmet: A pouch of coins meant for payment. Grave Robber Kujang asked you to deliver this to Grave Robber Bushobell.
없음_helmet: 물품 주머니, 도굴꾼 쿠쟝이 도굴꾼 부쇼벨에게 전해달라고 부탁한 보수입니다.
Empty_Helmet: Pouch of coins yang dimaksud untuk pembayaran. Graverobber Kujang meminta kamu untuk mengantrkan ini kepada Graverobber Bushobell.

Empty_helmet: Treasure that belonged to human victims and was hoarded by the monster.
Empty_Helmet: Harta benda milik Human, korban kejahatan monter telah dirampas.

Empty_helmet: The belongings of a soldier, stolen by a Leaf Bug. {nl}Looks like it's not the first time it has been stolen.
없음_helmet: 잎방개가 훔쳐간 정찰병의 짐. 한 두번 훔쳐간 게 아닌 것 같습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Barang - barang dari soldier, dicuri oleh Leaf Bug. {nl}Kelihatannya ini bukan pertama kalinya .

Empty_helmet: A ripped cloth piece from Vubbe. It's from the dirty waist area.
없음_helmet: 찢겨진 부베의 옷 조각. 허리춤의 지저분한 부분입니다.

Empty_helmet: If seems you can use this somewhere if you gather enough Vubbe toenails.
없음_helmet: 위버 발톱도 모아 놓으면 쓸 데가 있다고 합니다.
Empty_Helmet: Tampaknya kamu dapat menggunakan ini disuatu tempat kalau kamu mengumpulkan Vubbe toenail yang cukup.

Empty_helmet: Goods used as a provision for emergencies in the Mining Town.
없음_helmet: 광산 마을에 사고가 날 경우를 대비해 모아 놓은 구호품입니다.

Empty_helmet: Material required for reinforcement of the mine's exterior wall. Collect them before the wall crumbles.
없음_helmet: 광산 외벽을 보강하는데 필요한 자재. 무너지기 전에 빨리 모아 주세요.
Empty_Helmet: Material required for reinforcement of the mine's exterior wall. Collect them before the wall crumbles.

Empty_helmet: A stick used to expel Sequoia. It has a few holy spirits.

Empty_Helmet: Stick yang digunakan untuk merapal Sequoia. Itu memiliki sedikit holy spirit.

Empty_helmet: Ingredient for a tool that chases away road-blocking Sequoia. You can feel the faint holy power.

Empty_Helmet: Bahan - bahan untuk perlengkapan menghalau road-blocking Sequoia. Kamu dapat merasakan keuatan holy power.

Empty_helmet: Warrior's Essence. It is very necessary to give Sequoia the very best bit.
없음_helmet: 무명용사들의 정수. 세콰이아에게 강력한 한방을 먹이기 위해 꼭 필요합니다.
Empty_Helmet: Warrior Essence. Sangat penting untuk memberikan kepada Sequoia bit yang terbaik.

Empty_helmet: This stick was made by upgrading a Stinging Stick. It is capable of subduing Sequoia.
없음_helmet: 따끔한 꼬챙이를 보강하여 만든 꼬챙이. 이걸로 세콰이아가 더 이상 날뛸 수 없게 할 수 있다고 합니다.

Empty_helmet: The larvae of Meduja are eating away at the memories of life. They're sparkly.

Empty_helmet: The luggage of a dead merchant. His spirit is obsessed with it.

Empty_Helmet: Koper dari dead merchant. Rohnya terobsesi akan hal itu.

Empty_helmet: A scroll of protection. It seems the scholar's spirit was vanquished before using it.
없음_helmet: 수호용 주문서. 학자의 영혼은 이 주문서를 사용하지 못하고 죽은 것 같습니다.

Empty_helmet: A rubbed copy of the monument that the female explorer was looking for.
없음_helmet: 여류 탐험가가 찾던 추모비를 탁본한 사본. 아름다운 노랫 구절이 적혀 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Rubbed copy dari monumen yang female explorer cari - cari.

Empty_helmet: This stick was made by upgrading a Spiritual Stick. It holds the grudges of the Owl Sculptures..
없음_helmet: 영력이 깃든 꼬챙이를 보강한 꼬챙이. 부엉이 조각상들의 원념이 담겨 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Stick ini dibuat dengan mengupgrade Spiritual Stick. Itu mengandung dendam dari Owl Sculptures..

Empty_helmet: A keepsake from a dead soldier who was killed by monsters. It seems that the keepsake can comfort the soldiers' victimized spirit.

Empty_Helmet: Keepsake dari dead soldier yang dibunuh oleh monster. Tampaknya keepsake membuat nyaman para arwah.

Empty_helmet: This smell reminds me of my hometown.{nl}I miss my home.
없음_helmet: 고향의 향이 생각나게 하는 향. 왠지 그립습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Wangi ini mengingatkan ku pada kampung halaman.{nl}Aku merindukan rumah ku.

없음_helmet: 뭔가 기묘한 냄새가 나는 리디메드의 잎사귀.
Empty_Helmet: Wangi daun Ridimed yang tidak normal.

Empty_helmet: Abnormally smelling juices are oozing from it.
없음_helmet: 굉장한 냄새가 나는 즙이 뿜어져 나옵니다.
Empty_Helmet: Wangi tidak normal dari jus yang mengalir.

Empty_helmet: A monster bait to complete the last mission of dead soldiers.

Empty_Helmet: Monster bait untuk menyelesaikan mission terakhir dari dead soldiers.

Empty_helmet: Let's test it on a monster to confirm that it is working.
없음_helmet: 잘 듣는지 몬스터에게 미리 몬스터에게 시험해 보세요.

Empty_helmet: Old Kepa skin. The powder falls off it when shaken.
없음_helmet: 늙은 케파의 껍질. 가루가 풀풀 날립니다.
Empty_Helmet: Old Kepa skin. Powder akan jatuh ketikan di goyang.

Empty_helmet: Needed to make the bait more convincing. Will this bait work well?
없음_helmet: 미끼를 좀 더 그럴듯하게 보이기 위해 필요합니다. 잘 속일 수 있을까요?
Empty_Helmet: Perlu untuk membuat bait makin meyakinkan. Apakah bait ini akan bekerja dengan baik?

Empty_helmet: A corpse of Johan's squad. Please treat them well.
없음_helmet: 요한의 분대원들의 유해. 잘 수습해 주세요.
Empty_Helmet: Mayat dari pasukan Johan. Tolong perlakukan mereka dengan baik.

Empty_helmet: A hook that soldier Roy has to collect. He can return to his troops as soon as he collects it.
없음_helmet: 병사 로이가 모아야 할 갈고리. 이걸 빨리 모아야 로이가 복귀할 수 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Hook yang ingin didapatkan soldier Roy. Dia dapat kembali ke pasukannya segera setelah ia mendapatkannya.

Empty_helmet: Parts of it are covered in blood and unable to be read. Some parts are legible.
없음_helmet: 피에 젖어 내용이 잘 보이지 않는다. 일부는 읽어 볼 수 있을 것 같습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Bagian dari ini tertutup blood dan tidak dapat dibaca. Sebagian lainnya masih layak.

Empty_helmet: A material used to fix the wagon. Cut from the the hard part of the stem of a Hamming.
없음_helmet: 수레를 수리하기 위해 필요한 재료. 하밍의 줄기 중 단단한 부분만 잘라냈습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Material yang digunakan untuk memperbaiki wagon. Didapat dari bagian yang keras  dari stem of a Hanaming.

Empty_helmet: Fluid secreted from a Tini's gland. It has a sting to it.
없음_helmet: 티니의 분비샘에서 모은 분비액. 약간 따끔합니다.
Empty_Helmet: Cairan rahasia dari Tiny gland. Ini menyengat.

Empty_helmet: A herbicide made from the fluid of a Tini. You can remove thornbushes with it.
없음_helmet: 티니의 분비액으로 만든 제초제. 이걸로 가시덤불을 없앨 수 있다고 했습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Herbicide yang dibuat dari cairan Tiny. Kamu dapat memindahkan thornbushes dengan itu.

Empty_helmet: A certification awarded to soldiers who have safely completed training. Read it proudly.
없음_helmet: 무사히 훈련을 마친 병사에게 수여되는 수료증. 자랑스럽게 읽어보세요.
Empty_Helmet: Sertifikat yang diberikan kepada soldier yang telah berhasil menyelesaikan training. Baca dengan bangga.

Empty_helmet: The soft parts of Plantain Grass gathered up. It tastes bitter when chewed.
없음_helmet: 질경이 풀의 부드러운 부분만 모은 것. 씹으면 쓴 맛이 납니다.
Empty_Helmet: Bagian yang empuk dari Plantain Grass dikumpulkan. Terasa pahit ketika dikunyah.

Empty_helmet: Empty potion bottle stolen by a Vubbe. It sparkles as if it has been vigorously cleaned.
없음_helmet: 부베들이 훔쳐가 버린 빈 포션병. 열심히 닦았는지 반짝거립니다.
Empty_Helmet: Botol Empty potion yang dicuri oleh Vubbe. Itu bersinar dan telah dibersihkan.

Empty_helmet: An item that proves one's ability to the Sword Master. It's the heart of Stone Orca.
없음_helmet: 소드마스터에게 실력을 증명하기 위한 전리품. 스톤오르카의 심장입니다.
Empty_Helmet: Item yang membuktikan kemampuan kepada Sword Master. Itu adalah Jantung dari Stone Orca.

Empty_helmet: A Vubbe ointment that is used to treat their injured. It's not possible to use it as is.
없음_helmet: 다친 사람들을 치료하는데 쓸 부베들의 고약. 그냥은 쓸 수 없을 것 같습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Vubbe ointment yang digunakan untuk merawat mereka yang terluka. Tidak memungkinkan untuk menggunakan sebagaimana mestinya.

Empty_helmet: A slate that ordered the Guardians to attack evil things. They are attacking everyone because it is broken.
없음_helmet: 수호자들이 마족들을 색출하여 공격하게 명령하던 석판. 지금은 파괴되어 침입자 모두를 공격합니다.
Empty_Helmet: Batu tulis yang memerintahkan Guardians untuk menyerang hal jahat. Mereka menyerang semua orang karena rusak.

Empty_helmet: A stone that lights stone lanterns.{nl}Although it is burning, it isn't very hot.
없음_helmet: 석등을 켤 수 있는 돌. 불타고 있지만 뜨겁진 않습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Stone yang meninari lentera stone.{nl}Walaupun terbakar itu tidak terlalu panas.

Empty_helmet: Overusing the inhibitor can cause it to overheat and break.
없음_helmet: 억제기에 과도하게 사용하면 억제기가 과열되어 부서지게 된다고 합니다.
Empty_Helmet: Menggunakan inhibitor secara berlebihan dapat menyebabkan overheat dan rusak.

Empty_helmet: A token of Wheelens. Collecting them gives the power to defeat enemies.
없음_helmet: 휠렌이 지니고 있는 증표. 모으면 사악한 무리에 대적할 힘을 줍니다.
Empty_Helmet: Token dari Wheelen. Mengumpulkannya memberikan power untuk mengalahkan musuh.

Empty_helmet: A diary that Coben asked you to find.
Empty_Helmet: Diary yang diminta Coben untuk ditemukan.

Empty_helmet: A lump of fat that was pulled out after defeating Cockatrice.
Empty_Helmet: Gumpalan lemak yang keluar setelah mengalahkan Cockatrice.

Empty_helmet: If you set up this jar, it will absorb magical power from around you.
Empty_Helmet: Kalau kamu mengset  jar ini, itu akan menyerap magical power dari sekitar kamu.

Empty_helmet: Could be a cause of the disease.
없음_helmet: 타라 마일즈는 병을 옮길지도 모르는 원인중의 하나라고 합니다.

Empty_helmet: A gem that absorbs a monster's life force. It absorbs the life force of monsters defeated near it.
없음_helmet: 몬스터의 생명력을 담을 수 있는 보석. 적당한 범위 내에 처치된 몬스터의 생명력을 흡수해 버립니다.
Empty_Helmet: Gem yang menyerap life force dari monster. Itu menyerap life force dari monster yang sudah kalah disekitar nya.

Empty_helmet: A scroll required to solve the seal of King Zachariel. It is the first seal.
없음_helmet: 자카리엘 왕의 봉인을 푸는 데 필요한 스크롤. 첫 번째 봉인입니다.
Empty_Helmet: Scroll yang dibutuhkan untuk membuka seal dari King Zachariel. Ini ada seal pertama.

Empty_helmet: Any monster that uses fire abilities has a source.{nl}It is used to make Flame Gems.
없음_helmet: 불의 힘을 가진 몬스터라면 누구든 가지고 있는 근원. 홍염의 보석을 만드는데 쓰입니다.
Empty_Helmet: Monster apapun yang mengguabakan kemampuan fire memiliki source.{nl}Itu dapat digunakan untuk membuat Flame Gems.

Empty_helmet: Makes finding fire easy but how Grita got it is a mystery.
없음_helmet: 불의 단지를 찾는데 용이하다만 어째서 그리타가 가지고 있을까요?
Empty_Helmet: Membuat menemukan api mudah tapi bagaimana Grita mendapatkannya masih berupa misteri.

Empty_helmet: Research material stolen by monsters. It seems that monsters like to steal such documents.
없음_helmet: 몬스터가 훔쳐간 연구자료. 연구자료는 몬스터에 의한 도난이 유독 잦은 것 같습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Research material dicuri oleh monsters. Tampaknya para monster suka mencuri hal seperti itu.

Empty_helmet: Hard lime used to make forgeries.
없음_helmet: 위조품을 만드는데 사용할 딱딱한 석회. 이걸로 본을 뜨는 건가 봅니다.
Empty_Helmet: Hard lime digunakan untuk membuat forgeries.

Empty_helmet: A counterfeit item proving the existence of forgery.{nl}It is yet to be finished.
없음_helmet: 위조의 결정적인 증거가 될 위조품. 아직 마무리가 남았습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Counterfeit item membuktikan eksistensi dari tiruan.{nl}Tapi masih belum terselesaikan.

Empty_helmet: Piece of a building with beautiful pattern on it. It seems that the architect put a lot of work into making it.

Empty_Helmet: Bagian dari gedung dengan corak yang indah. Tampaknya para arsitek bersungguh -singgih dalam membuatnya.

Empty_helmet: There are various tools inside, like a dowsing rod to check for underground tombs.
없음_helmet: 땅 속에 무엇이 들어 있는지 알 수 있는 꼬챙이 등 다양한 도구가 들어 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: The Saugas store their loot in bags.{nl}They share their loot equally.

Empty_Helmet: Saugas menyimpan barangnya di bag.{nl} Mereka membagi barangnya sama rata.

Empty_helmet: A very ancient looking token of an archaeologist.
Empty_Helmet: Token yang sangat langka dari archaeologist.

Empty_helmet: The highly toxic poison of a Woodfung. It releases this poison into the air when frightened.

Empty_Helmet: Toxic poison dari Woodfung yang sangat tinggi. Ia mengeluarkan racun ini ke udara ketika merasa terancam.

Empty_helmet: A sack holding a monster's hand
Lizardman Blood is used in experiments conducted by necromancers.
Empty_Helmet: Lizardman Blood yang digunakan dalam eksperimen yang dilakukan oleh necromancers.

Empty_helmet: A soul jar given by the Necromancer Drasius. It will inhale monsters who are on the verge of death.

Empty_Helmet: Soul jar yang diberikan oleh Necromancer Drasius. Ini akan menyedot monster yang di ambang kematian.

Empty_Helmet: Simbol yang lambangkan sesorang telah menyesaikan ordeal yang dipersiapkan oleh Great King Zachariel. Sepertinya berkaitan dengan seal dari Royal Tomb.

Empty_helmet: A sword with a piece missing from it.
These relics might help identify the dead bodies.
없음_helmet: 시신의 신원을 알 수도 있는 유품.
Empty_Helmet: Relic ini mungkin menolong mengidentifikasi mayat - mayat.

Empty_helmet: This piece fits into the Chipped Sword.
없음_helmet: 이가 빠진 부분과 딱 맞는 조각.
Empty_Helmet: Bagian ini cocok dengan Chipped Sword.

Empty_helmet: Wood picked from the wood pile by Cahill.

Empty_helmet: Leather that can be used in a variety of ways. The age of the leather means that it can be used immediately.

Empty_Helmet: Leather yang dapat digunakan dengan berbagai cara. Age of the leather berarti itu dapat digunakan dengan segera.

Empty_helmet: A letter containing the heart of Moses Diesel.
Empty_Helmet: Letter yang mengandung heart dari Moses Diesel.

Empty_helmet: Moses Diesel made these crutches for the village youngster Cahill.

Empty_helmet: The first material Ahylas Jonas requested to undo the seal.

Empty_helmet: An ingredient to make a Crystal Gem.
Empty_Helmet: Bahan - bahan untuk membuat Crystal Gem.

Empty_helmet: A crystal needed to release the seal of Ramstis Ridge

Empty_helmet: A research report lost by the new Royal Mausoleum researcher. Someone has stepped on it and blurred the characters. It's just barely readable.

Empty_Helmet: Kehilangan research report dilaporkan oleh Royal Tomb researcher yang baru. Seseorang telah minginjak dan menyamarkan. Ini hampir tidak dapat dibaca.

Empty_helmet: Could someone eventually find out the location of the Great King Zachariel's inheritance?
없음_helmet: 드디어 자카리엘 대왕이 숨겨둔 유산을 찾을 수 있는 것일까요.

Empty_helmet: An antidote that can counteract Scorpion's poison. Let's bring this to Dezic.

Empty_helmet: It seems it will explode if it is touched. Be careful.
없음_helmet: 건드리면 폭발할 것 같은 마력의 응집원. 조심히 다뤄주세요.
Empty_Helmet: Tampaknya akan meledak apabila disentuh. Berhati - hatilah.

Empty_helmet: Meat gotten by slaying Infroburks. It looks tough.

Empty_Helmet: Meat yang didapatkan dengan cara membunuh Infroburks. Itu terlihat a lot.

Empty_helmet: It seems to use as a firewood.
없음_helmet: 트리암불로의 잔해들. 장작으로 사용할 수 있을 것 같습니다.

Empty_helmet: A piece of a broken tombstone found from a Sea Turtle. You have to put the pieces of tombstone together to see whose it is.

Empty_Helmet: Bongkahan dari batu nisan yang rusak ditemukan di Sea Turtle. Kamu harus menyatukan potongan dari batu nisan itu untuk mengetahui batu nisan siapakah itu.

Empty_helmet: Finally restored the tombstone. What is in there?
없음_helmet: 드디어 복원을 마쳤다. 어떤 내용이 담겨 있을까요?

Empty_helmet: A piece of Flurry's tombstone that a Tama picked up and ate.
Empty_Helmet: Bagian dari Flurry's tombstone yang diambil dan dimakan Tama.

Empty_helmet: Luggage filled with odds and ends.
Empty_Helmet: Luggage yang berisi barang tidak berguna.

Empty_helmet: A material needed to open the sealed manual. Doesn't go out no matter how much you try.

Empty_helmet: The Holy Ark for holding souls has been broken. Will collecting its pieces be enough?

Empty_Helmet: Holy Ark untuk menimpan souls telah rusak. Apakah mengumpulkan bagiannya akan cukup?

Empty_helmet: A monster's Small Crystal that the Suspicious Chair asked you to collect. To call it a crystal is a stretch, though.

Empty_helmet: The voice of a spirit sealed within the Sealed Stone. You can hear a faint whisper from it.

Empty_helmet: A crystal infused with magic to prevent the sealed spirit from escaping.

Empty_helmet: The Variation Mediator substance that the Variation Magician Furry Odd asked you to collect.

Empty_helmet: A crystal that has been carelessly burnt.

Empty_helmet: A burning charm. Because it was in a monster's stomach, it is wet and smells bad.

Empty_Helmet: Charm terbakar. Karena berada di dalam perut monster, jadi agak basah dan berbau tidak enak.

Empty_helmet: Silver dye used for Simon Shaw's tattoo. It is relatively easy to get.

Empty_Helmet: Sebuah kekuatan yang menggerakkan Red Infro Rockter. Grita yang tidak dapat menggunakan mantra sihir membutuhkannya

Empty_Helmet: Dibutuhkan untuk menstabilkan Jewel of Prominence.

Empty_helmet: It contains instructions on how to eliminate the thorn vines. Familiarize yourself with it.

Empty_helmet: A crystal needed to remove thorn vines by holy power. It needs charging and refining to be used.

Empty_Helmet: Crystal dibutuhkan untuk melepas tanaman berduri dengan kekuatan suci. Membutuhkan pengisian dan pemurnian untuk menggunakan.

Empty_helmet: The remains of a Thornball. Burns well, even in the rain.

Empty_helmet: Some fluid with a sour smell that oozed out from a toenail.

Empty_helmet: A useful fluid for flushing out the mini Griba that has become a parasite on Greepelli's hair.

Empty_helmet: An Operor's stinger that has the power to purify corrupted magic crystals.

Empty_helmet: A completely purified magical crystal. It can remove the thorn vines blocking the path.

Empty_Helmet: Part didapat di sekitar cable car yang rusak.

A legendary verse used to defeat Gesti. Seems like it's not the right time to use this.

Empty_helmet: Lowers the strength of monsters when used on them.

Empty_helmet: A piece broken off from the altar on the second floor of the Church.

없음_helmet: 파괴된 마자즈 쉼터 결계의 조각. 복구할 수 있을까요?

Empty_helmet: A material that is needed to wake up the Nepenthes. It doesn't catch fire in its current state.

Empty_Helmet: Material untuk membangunkan Nepenthes. Tidak akan menimbulkan api dalam keadaan seperti ini.

Empty_helmet: The fat of a Mallardu that was well preserved and will burn easily. Wake Nepenthes with it.
없음_helmet: 말라두의 지방이 불에 잘 탈 수 있도록 갈무리했다. 이걸로 네펜데스를 깨우세요.
Empty_Helmet: The fat of Mallardu baik disimpan untuk membakar dengan mudah. Mari kita bangun Nepenthes dengan itu

Empty_helmet: It must be gathered from the Nepenthes while it's alive for it to have any effect.
없음_helmet: 네펜더스가 살아있을 때에 채취해야 효과가 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Ini pasti dikumpulkan dari Nepenthes yang hidup untuknya untuk mempunyai efek apapun.

Empty_helmet: Secretion that can be used to attract Biteregina
Empty_Helmet: Secretion yang dapat digunakan untuk menarik Biteregina

Empty_helmet: An enemy killed with this charm attached to them will join your side!
없음_helmet: 부착한 적이 죽으면 우리 편으로 세뇌되어 되살아납니다!
Empty_Helmet: Musuh yang tewas dengan disertai charm ini akan bergabung denganmu!

Empty_helmet: The first revelation found in the Crystal Mine. Readable.
없음_helmet: 수정광산에서 발견된 첫 번째 계시. 읽어 볼 수 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Wahyu pertama ditemukan di Crystal Mine. Dapat dibaca

Empty_helmet: Rodelin's eye. It is said to be able to erase an enemy's senses.
없음_helmet: 로델린의 눈. 이걸로 기척을 지울 수 있다고 합니다.
Empty_Helmet: Mata Rodelin. Kabarnya mampu menghapus indera musuh.

Empty_helmet: Material needed to create a Holy Bomb. It must be purified before it can be used.
없음_helmet: 성령폭탄을 만들기 위한 재료. 정화해야 쓸 수 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Material untuk membuat holy bomb. Digunakan jika telah disucikan.

Empty_helmet: Material needed to create a Holy Bomb. The purified result of a Vicious Essence.
없음_helmet: 성령폭탄을 만들기 위한 재료. 사악한 정수를 정화하였습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Material yang diperlukan untuk membuat Holy Bomb. Hasil pemurnian dari Vicious Essence.

Empty_helmet: Consuming this will prevent demons from detecting your presence!
Empty_Helmet: Setelah dimakan, ini akan mencegah demon mendeteksi keberadaanmu!

Empty_helmet: The bomb with the sacred power. You can defeat Glizardon at once!
없음_helmet: 성력이 깃든 폭탄. 글리자돈을 일격에 처치할 수 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Bom dengan kekuatan suci. Kamu dapat mengalahkan Glizardon sekaligus!

Empty_helmet: Once the scroll is used, one can distinguish which Hogmas are wearing necklaces.
없음_helmet: 스크롤을 사용하면 목걸이를 가진 호그마를 구분할 수 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Setelah scroll digunakan, kita dapat membedakan mana Hogmas yang mengenakan necklace.

Empty_helmet: On the back "To ...oved Rukl...s, Lydia." is visible.
없음_helmet: 뒷 면에 ..랑했던 루클..스 에게, 리디아가. 라고 새겨져 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Pada bagian belakang, "To…oved Rukl..s, Lydia." terlihat.

Empty_helmet: A skirt hem obtained by defeating Pawndel and Pawnd. Material needed to make the Demon Transform Scroll.
없음_helmet: 폰델과 폰드를 처치하고 얻은 옷자락. 마족 변신 스크롤을 만들 재료입니다.
Empty_Helmet: Skirt didapat dengan mengalah Pawndel and Pawnd. Ini adalah material untuk membuat demon transformation scroll.

Empty_helmet: A bucket used to hold water. Seems like a rope can be tied to it.
없음_helmet: 물을 담던 양동이. 줄에 매달아 쓸 수 있을 것 같습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Bucket digunakan untuk membawa air. Sepertinya tali dapat diikatkan padanya.

Empty_helmet: A very long rope. Seems like something can be tied to it.

Empty_helmet: Use this scroll to transform into Pawndel or Pawnd.
없음_helmet: 사용하면 폰델이나 폰드 중 하나로 변신할 수 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: A Power Crystal processed and filled with the power of light. It can release the enchantment that binds the sealed church gates.

Empty_Helmet: Power Crystal diproses dan diisi dengan kekuatan cahaya. Benda ini dapat melepaskan sihir yang mengikat pada chapel gates.

Empty_helmet: Old and muddy necklace dropped by someone long ago.
없음_helmet: 누군가가 오래 전 떨어뜨린, 낡고 흙투성이의 목걸이.

Empty_helmet: Wooden arrow used by High Vubbe Archers. It might be useful for kindling.

Empty_Helmet: Wooden Arrow digunakan oleh High Vubbe Archer. Mungkin berguna untuk pembakaran.

Empty_Helmet: Ingredient dibutuhkan untuk membuat Crude Divining Rod yang digunakan untuk mencari First Tombstone Fragment. Kamu harus mengumpulkan ini sebanyak mungkin.

Empty_helmet: A divining rod used to search for the First Tombstone Fragment which has been hidden somewhere underground. Looks weak enough to be broken by even the slightest amount of force.
없음_helmet: 땅 속 어딘가에 숨어있는 첫 번째 비석 조각을 찾기 위한 탐사막대. 힘을 조금만 가하면 부러질듯 약해 보입니다.
Empty_Helmet: Tongkat peramal digunakan untuk mencari First Tombstone Fragment yang telah disembunyikan di suatu tempat bawah tanah. Terlihat cukup lemah untuk dihancurkan bahkan dengan sedikit tenaga.

Empty_helmet: A revelation that Bramble had. It's unreadable - let's take it to Goddess Saule.

Empty_helmet: It is said to be able to wake the sleeping Boowook.

Empty_helmet: A Zolem's Magic Stone needed to lure a Unicorn.

Empty_helmet: A trophy taken from a defeated Unicorn. Let's take it to the Fedimian Army Officer.

Empty_Helmet: Tropi dari Unicorn mati. Bawalah ke Fedimian Army Officer.

Empty_helmet: A cork stopper that was sealing the oil barrel.
Empty_Helmet: Penyumbat gabus yang digunakan untuk menutup barel minyak.
Peralatan yang digunakan untuk membuat beer.

Empty_helmet: A claw of a Rambear that lurks in the petrified city of Verkti Square.

Empty_Helmet: Cakar Rambear yang berkeliaran di Petrified City of Verkti Squar.

Empty_helmet: A water bottle engraved with a password to find the grave robber Benjaminas hidden among the guards of the Petrified City of Verkti Square.
없음_helmet: 석화된 도시 베르크티 광장의 경비병들 무리에 숨어있는 도굴꾼 벤자미나스를 찾기 위한 암호가 새겨진 물병.

Empty_helmet: A map that looks ancient. It looks like it will crumble.

Empty_helmet: A fragrant stone powder obtained from monsters in the petrified city of Verkti Square.
없음_helmet: 석화된 도시 베르크티 광장의 몬스터들에게 얻은 향나는 돌가루.
Empty_Helmet: Sebuah Fragrant Stone Powder didapat dari monster di Petrified City of Verkti Square.

Empty_helmet: Meat loaf that can be easily obtained from Kepo. However, you can't eat it as is.
없음_helmet: 케포으로부터 쉽게 구할 수 있는 고기덩어리. 그러나 사람이라면 절대 먹을 수 없습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Selembar roti yang didapat dengan mudah dari Kepo. Sayang, kamu tidak bisa memakannya.

Empty_helmet: The inner layer of bark dug out from a tree on the Starving Demon's Way. Don't eat too much of it.

Empty_Helmet: Lapisan dalam kulit pohon, digali dari pohon di Starving Demon's Road. Jangan makan terlalu banyak.

Empty_helmet: An item exchanged between lovers as a symbol of their love. A cute music box that fits into a small pouch.
없음_helmet: 연인간에 서로의 정표로 교환 했던 물건. 작은 주머니에 담긴 앙증맞은 오르골입니다.
Empty_Helmet: Benda yang ditukar antar pasangan sebagai bukti cinta mereka. Kotak musik imut yang muat di kantung kecil.

Empty_helmet: A piece of a Kepari's flesh torn off while hunting. The disgusting smell make it impossible to eat.
없음_helmet: 사냥 중에 뜯겨져 나온 케파리의 살점. 끔찍한 냄새 때문에 도저히 그냥은 먹을 수 없습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Sebuah dagin Kepari yang dikoyak saat berburu. Aroma tak sedap membuatnya tak mungkin dimakan.

Empty_helmet: The leaf bud of an Asellu grown on the Starving Demon's Way. It has many practical uses in crafting and in medicine.

Empty_Helmet: Kuncup daun Asellu yang tumbuh di Starving Demon's Road. Banyak berguna dalam crafting dan obat-obatan.

Empty_helmet: Unidentifiable food scraps. Can be used as monster bait. When a monster comes into sight, you can throw it by pressing the V key.

Empty_Helmet: Sisa makanan tak dikenal. Bisa digunakan untuk umpan monster. Jika berpapasan dengan monster, tekan tombol V untuk menggunakan ini.

Empty_helmet: An energy source sprinkled by the Tree Root Crystal. These need to be collected to remove the contamination.

Empty_Helmet: Sumber energi yang ditabur dari Tree Root Crystal. Kumpulkan ini untuk menghilangkan kontaminasinya.

Empty_helmet: It reveals monsters that killed pilgrims with the Curse of Rage when sprayed on them.

Empty_Helmet: Benda ini menampakkan monster yang membunuh peziarah dengan Curse of Rage jika disemprot kepada mereka.

Empty_helmet: A flower to be offered on the altar to soothe angry souls.

Empty_helmet: Water for cleaning plaster powder off after repairing the Goddess Statue. It is very clean.

Empty_Helmet: Air untuk membersihkan bubuk semen setelah Statue of Goddess selesai direparasi. Air ini sangat bersih.

Empty_helmet: Water from a small brook in the Forest of Prayer.{nl}It looks potable.
없음_helmet: 기원의 숲의 작은 시내에서 흐르는 물. 마셔도 될 것 같습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Air dari anak sungai di Forest of Prayer.{nl}Tampaknya dapat diminum.

Empty_helmet: Dew gathered from a tombstone early in the morning. One might have qualms against it, but it can be drunk.
없음_helmet: 새벽의 묘비에 맺혀 있던 이슬. 그냥 마시기엔 꺼림칙하지만, 일단 마실 수는 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Embun terkumpul dari batu nisan di pagi hari. Beberapa akan merasa mual, tapi ini dapat diminum.

Empty_helmet: Medicine created by the pilgrim, Theophilis. He claims it will ward off curses.
없음_helmet: 순례자 테오필리스가 만든 약. 저주에 걸리지 않는다고 합니다.
Empty_Helmet: Obat yang dibuat oleh peziarah, Theophilis. Katanya, dapat menghilangkan kutukan.

Empty_helmet: The Succubus' eyes with the [Necklace of Greed - Stamina] lodged in it. Theophilis can probably extract the necklace if we take it to him.
없음_helmet: [탐욕의 목걸이 - 체력] 이 박혀 있는, 서큐버스의 눈. 테오필리스에게 가져다 주면 목걸이를 빼내어 줄 것 같습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Mata Succubus dengan [Necklace of Greed - Stamina] tersisip di dalamnya. Theophilis mungkin bisa mengeluarkan kalung itu.

Empty_helmet: A piece of a honeycomb that emits a strong and sweet scent.
Empty_Helmet: Sepotong sarang lebah yang mengeluarkan aroma kuat dan wangi.

Empty_helmet: An unidentified piece of a demonic stone that was put on the altar.
없음_helmet: 제단에 놓여져 있던 정체불명의 마석 조각.
Empty_Helmet: Potongan patung iblis tak teridentifikasi yang tadinya ditaruh di altar.

Empty_helmet: A piece of honeycomb that is sweet to the tongue.
없음_helmet: 먹으면 아주 달콤한 맛이 나는 벌통 조각.
Empty_Helmet: Sepotong sarang lebah yang terasa manis di lidah.

Empty_helmet: The crystal of a spirit filled with a holy aura.
Empty_Helmet: Crystal dari roh yang berisi aura suci.

Empty_helmet: A scripture containing the power of sacred texts.
없음_helmet: 성스러운 말씀의 힘이 담겨져 있는 경전.
Empty_Helmet: Naskah berisi kekuatan dari tulisan suci.

Empty_helmet: A scripture containing a bishop's soul.{nl}It's able to call up the bishop at any time.
없음_helmet: 주교의 영혼이 담긴 경전. 이것으로 주교의 영혼을 언제든지 불러낼 수 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Naskah berisi jiwa bishop.{nl}Dapat digunakan untuk memanggil bishop itu kapan saja.

Empty_helmet: A teardrop-shaped jewel.{nl}Required to find Maven's key.
없음_helmet: 물방울 모양의 보석. 메이번의 열쇠를 찾기 위해 필요하다고 합니다.
Empty_Helmet: Permata berbentuk tetesan air.{nl}Diperlukan untuk menemukan Maven's Key.

Empty_helmet: A round jewel. Required to find Maven's key.
없음_helmet: 둥근 모양의 보석. 메이번의 열쇠를 찾기 위해 필요하다고 합니다.
Empty_Helmet: Permata bundar. Diperlukan untuk menemukan Maven's Key.

Empty_helmet: The first key of Maven. It is said that all 5 keys must be gathered to reach the revelation.
없음_helmet: 메이번의 첫 번째 열쇠. 모두 다섯 개의 열쇠를 모아야 계시에 다가갈 수 있다고 합니다.
Empty_Helmet: Kunci pertama dari Maven. Menurut legenda, kelima kunci harus dikumpulkan untuk mendapat wahyu.

Empty_helmet: Keepsake of a guard who was petrified by the frost in the petrified city of Roxona Marketplace.
없음_helmet: 석화된 도시 록소나 장터에서 석화된 서리에 의해 석화당한 경비병들의 유품.
Empty_Helmet: Kenang-kenangan dari penjaga yang membeku karena dingin di kota membatu Roxona Marketplace.

Empty_helmet: A backpack filled with tools necessary to start a farm.
없음_helmet: 농사를 짓는데 필요한 농기구들이 잔뜩 든 배낭.
Empty_Helmet: Tas berisi peralatan untuk bekerja di ladang.

Empty_helmet: A branch of a bee tree containing the power of Goddess Austeja.
없음_helmet: 아우스테야 여신의 힘이 깃든 벌나무의 가지.
Empty_Helmet: Cabang pohon lebah berisi kekuatan Goddess Austeja.

Empty_helmet: The ash of a demon incinerated by Goddess Austeja's power.
없음_helmet: 아우스테야 여신의 힘에 불타버린 마족의 재.
Empty_Helmet: Abu iblis yang dibakar oleh kekuatan Goddess Austeja.

Empty_helmet: An orb that can destroy demonic enchantments. You can gather magic by using it around Austeja's Altar.
없음_helmet: 마족의 결계를 파괴할 수 있는 구슬. 아우스테야 제단 근처에서 사용하면 마력을 모을 수 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Orb yang dapat menghancurkan kekuatan pikatan iblis. Kamu bisa mengumpulkan kekuatan ajaib dengan menggunakannya di sekitar Austeja's Altar.

Empty_helmet: Wood of the appropriate length and width to make a scarecrow. It will make an amazing scarecrow.
없음_helmet: 허수아비로 만들기에 적당한 두께와 길이의 목재. 엄청난 허수아비를 만든다고 했습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Kayu dengan ukuran pas untuk membuat Scarecrow. Hasilnya akan sangat bagus.

Empty_helmet: Curse energy that has been condensed.{nl}Spat out from a monster as it died.
없음_helmet: 저주의 기운이 응어리진 것. 몬스터가 죽으면서 토해냈습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Energi jahat yang telah dimampatkan.{nl}Diludahi monster menjelang kematiannya.

Empty_helmet: The third revelation found in the Thorn Forest. Readable.
없음_helmet: 가시숲에서 발견된 세 번째 계시. 읽어 볼 수 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Wahyu ketiga ditemukan di Thorn Forest. Dapat dibaca.

Empty_helmet: The fourth revelation found in the Royal Mausoleum. Readable.
없음_helmet: 왕릉에서 발견된 네 번째 계시. 읽어 볼 수 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Wahyu keempat ditemukan di Royal Tomb. Dapat dibaca.

Empty_helmet: It cannot be read yet. Take it to Saule for interpretation.
없음_helmet: 아직 읽을 수 없다. 여신 사울레에게 계시의 해석을 부탁하세요.
Empty_Helmet: Belum dapat dibaca. Bawa kepada Saule untuk penafsiran.

Empty_helmet: Tool used to make a rubbing of the petrified book found on Ruklys Street.
없음_helmet: 루클리스 거리의 석화된 책의 탁본을 제작하기 위한 도구.
Empty_Helmet: Alat untuk menjiplak buku membeku yang ditemukan di Ruklys Street.

Empty_helmet: Tool used to find out the past disaster of Ruklys Street
없음_helmet: 과거 루클리스 거리에서 벌어진 참사를 알아보기 위한 도구.
Empty_Helmet: Alat untuk mencari tahu musibah yang terjadi di Ruklys Street pada masa lampau.

Empty_helmet: A symbol originally decorating the Austeja Altar. It was broken during the monsters' attack.
없음_helmet: 원래는 아우스테야 제단에 장식되어 있던 상징. 몬스터의 공격에 의해 조각나 버렸습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Simbol ini tadinya sebagai dekorasi Austeja Altar. Rusak saat serangan para monster.

Empty_helmet: A symbol containing Goddess Austeja's power, it has the ability to block demonic powers.
없음_helmet: 아우스테야 여신의 힘이 깃든 상징물, 마족의 힘을 차단하는 효과가 있습니다.
Empty_Helmet: Simbol yang mengandung kekuatan Goddess Austeja, punya kekuatan untuk menangkal kekuatan iblis.

Empty_helmet: A package that the merchant Dulke lost.{nl}It contains sundry goods.
없음_helmet: 상인 둘케가 잃어버린 짐. 안에 잡다한 생필품들이 들어 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: A sweet-smelling jelly that can bring the Spring Light Grass out from hiding.
없음_helmet: 숨어 있는 봄볕초를 찾아낼 수 있는 벌꿀 향이 풍기는 젤리.

Empty_helmet: Mysterious grass that arises from the ground when it smells honey.
없음_helmet: 벌꿀향이 풍기면 땅속에서 솟아오르는 신기한 풀.
Empty_Helmet: Bunga misterius yang tumbuh dari tanah jika mencium aroma madu.

Empty_helmet: The second key of Maven. It is said that all 5 keys must be gathered to reach the revelation.

없음_helmet: 메이번의 네 번째 열쇠. 모두 다섯 개의 열쇠를 모아야 계시에 다가갈 수 있다고 합니다.
Empty_Helmet: Kunci keempat dari Maven. Menurut legenda, kelima kunci harus dikumpulkan untuk mendapat wahyu.

없음_helmet: 메이번의 다섯 번째 열쇠. 모두 다섯 개의 열쇠를 모아야 계시에 다가갈 수 있다고 합니다.
